"Folded Flower Handkerchief" - A handkerchief that can be easily folded into a compact and portable flower, making it a perfect accessory for outdoor events.
"Smart Handkerchief" - A handkerchief that can change color based on the temperature, making it a useful tool for tracking the weather and staying cool.
"Handkerchief with Built-in Air Freshener" - A handkerchief that has a built-in air freshener, making it perfect for freshening up on-the-go.
"Handkerchief with Built-in Camera" - A handkerchief that has a built-in camera, making it perfect for capturing memories and snapping photos.
"Handkerchief with Built-in GPS" - A handkerchief that has a built-in GPS, making it perfect for tracking your location and exploring new places.
